intro: Myosotis brachypoda, commonly known as the short-stemmed forget-me-not, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It is a herbaceous perennial that typically grows to a height of about 15–30 centimeters. The plant features slender, upright stems and produces clusters of small, sky-blue to violet flowers. Its leaves are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, contributing to its distinctive appearance. Myosotis brachypoda thrives in moist, shady environments and is often found in forested areas and along stream banks.
